result.name: Sustainable Small Ruminant Production through Selection for Resistance to Internal Parasites (goat)
result.description: Animals used in the study belong to from four commercial farms and Langston University, born between 2013 and 2015. A total number of one hundred and forty four goats were genotyped with Capture Sequencing (Rapid Genomics, Gainesville, FL). The samples correspond to Boer, Kiko and Spanish goats.
result.center: University of Florida, Department of Animal Sciences
